name: Kartikey Sheokand
position: Product and Analytics at GoDaddy || Ex-Flipkart

current_company.name: GoDaddy
current_company.title: Product and Analytics at GoDaddy || Ex-Flipkart

experience.title: Product Analytics
experience.description: - Conducted a thorough analysis of over 150 A/B experiments throughout the shopping funnel, resulting in the acquisition of more than 3 million active customers and an additional 4 million new customers - Streamlined the migration to a new A/B platform by optimizing event passing, ultimately saving 35% (25+ crores) in costs - Singlehandedly analyzed the payment page, providing the foundation for its revamp with a goal of generating 7000 crores- Developed a strategy for 2023 with a revised target metric for the team, estimating the total impact and potential revenue
experience.description_html: - Conducted a thorough analysis of over 150 A/B experiments throughout the shopping funnel, resulting in the acquisition of more than 3 million active customers and an additional 4 million new customers - Streamlined the migration to a new A/B platform by optimizing event passing, ultimately saving 35% (25+ crores) in costs - Singlehandedly analyzed the payment page, providing the foundation for its revamp with a goal of generating 7000 crores- Developed a strategy for 2023 with a revised target metric for the team, estimating the total impact and potential revenue

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: - Successfully solved the perfect order prediction problem for Tata CliQ with 73% accuracy, surpassing previous models by 10%-  Utilized SQL to extract over 100 data features and applied feature engineering and EDA to enhance model performance. -  Designed tree-based models to predict breaches in delivery, product and customer areas, achieving a mean accuracy of 80%- Enhanced the model's interpretability by implementing four sub-models, enabling more informed business decisions
experience.description_html: - Successfully solved the perfect order prediction problem for Tata CliQ with 73% accuracy, surpassing previous models by 10%- Utilized SQL to extract over 100 data features and applied feature engineering and EDA to enhance model performance. - Designed tree-based models to predict breaches in delivery, product and customer areas, achieving a mean accuracy of 80%- Enhanced the model's interpretability by implementing four sub-models, enabling more informed business decisions <!---->
